languages.text: Процесс выжигания палубы был начат по всем правилам, однако стремительно вышел из под контроля, когда выяснилось, что отсек не был эвакуирован до конца. Разошедшееся пламя уничтожило бесценные машины, а запертые в дальних каютах люди задохнулись от дыма или погибли в давке. Несмотря на потери, план увенчался успехом, и твари из теней пропали.

The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.
languages.original_text: Процесс выжигания палубы был начат по всем правилам, однако стремительно вышел из под контроля, когда выяснилось, что отсек не был эвакуирован до конца. Разошедшееся пламя уничтожило бесценные машины, а запертые в дальних каютах люди задохнулись от дыма или погибли в давке. Несмотря на потери, план увенчался успехом, и твари из теней пропали.

traits.locale_text: The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins were either choked by the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow skulkers were never seen again.

Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow skulkers were never seen again.

Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

languages.text: 船员开始焚烧起了甲板。焚烧过程一开始进展顺利，但很快就失去了控制，因为人们发现有些船舱并没有被完全疏散。熊熊烈焰烧毁了许多台贵重的机器，而那些被锁在偏僻船舱里的人，要么是被有毒的烟雾呛死，要么是在踩踏中丧生。尽管损失惨重，但计划还是成功了，再也没有人见过那群躲在阴影中的猎手。
languages.original_text: The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

traits.locale_text: 船员开始焚烧起了甲板。焚烧过程一开始进展顺利，但很快就失去了控制，因为人们发现有些船舱并没有被完全疏散。熊熊烈焰烧毁了许多台贵重的机器，而那些被锁在偏僻船舱里的人，要么是被有毒的烟雾呛死，要么是在踩踏中丧生。尽管损失惨重，但计划还是成功了，再也没有人见过那群躲在阴影中的猎手。

languages.text: La quema de las cubiertas comenzó correctamente, pero se descontroló rápidamente cuando se supo que la cámara no había sido totalmente evacuada. Las voraces llamas destruyeron muchas máquinas de gran valor y las personas encerradas en camarotes distantes se asfixiaron con el humo tóxico o perecieron en la estampida. A pesar de las pérdidas, el plan fue un éxito y nunca más se volvió a ver a los acechadores de las sombras.
languages.original_text: The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

traits.locale_text: La quema de las cubiertas comenzó correctamente, pero se descontroló rápidamente cuando se supo que la cámara no había sido totalmente evacuada. Las voraces llamas destruyeron muchas máquinas de gran valor y las personas encerradas en camarotes distantes se asfixiaron con el humo tóxico o perecieron en la estampida. A pesar de las pérdidas, el plan fue un éxito y nunca más se volvió a ver a los acechadores de las sombras.

languages.text: デッキの焼却は手順通りに始まったが、空間の避難活動が完全に終わってないことが明らかになり、すぐに手がつけられない状態になった。唸りをあげる炎が多くの貴重な機械を破壊して、遠くのキャビンから出れない人々は、有毒な煙で呼吸ができなくなったり、人が押し寄せて命を落としたりした。損失はあったものの計画は成功して、影に潜むものは二度と姿を現さなかった。
languages.original_text: The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

traits.locale_text: デッキの焼却は手順通りに始まったが、空間の避難活動が完全に終わってないことが明らかになり、すぐに手がつけられない状態になった。唸りをあげる炎が多くの貴重な機械を破壊して、遠くのキャビンから出れない人々は、有毒な煙で呼吸ができなくなったり、人が押し寄せて命を落としたりした。損失はあったものの計画は成功して、影に潜むものは二度と姿を現さなかった。

languages.text: La purification des ponts par le feu devient rapidement incontrôlable lorsqu'il apparaît que la salle n'a pas été entièrement évacuée. Les flammes rugissantes détruisent de nombreuses machines inestimables, et ceux qui se sont cloîtrés dans des cabines éloignées suffoquent à cause de la fumée toxique ou périssent dans la bousculade qui s'en suit. Malgré ces terribles pertes, le plan fonctionne et les rôdeurs de l'ombre disparaissent pour de bon.
languages.original_text: The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

traits.locale_text: La purification des ponts par le feu devient rapidement incontrôlable lorsqu'il apparaît que la salle n'a pas été entièrement évacuée. Les flammes rugissantes détruisent de nombreuses machines inestimables, et ceux qui se sont cloîtrés dans des cabines éloignées suffoquent à cause de la fumée toxique ou périssent dans la bousculade qui s'en suit. Malgré ces terribles pertes, le plan fonctionne et les rôdeurs de l'ombre disparaissent pour de bon.

languages.text: Die Feuerreinigung der Decks begann reibungslos, geriet jedoch schnell außer Kontrolle, als klar wurde, dass die Kammer nicht vollständig evakuiert worden war. Die brüllenden Flammen zerstörten viele unschätzbar wertvolle Maschinen, und die in abgelegenen Kabinen eingeschlossenen Bewohner erstickten entweder an den giftigen Dämpfen oder wurden bei der Massenpanik totgetrampelt. Trotz der Verluste war der Plan aber ein Erfolg und die Schattenkreaturen wurden nie wieder gesehen.
languages.original_text: The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.

traits.locale_text: Die Feuerreinigung der Decks begann reibungslos, geriet jedoch schnell außer Kontrolle, als klar wurde, dass die Kammer nicht vollständig evakuiert worden war. Die brüllenden Flammen zerstörten viele unschätzbar wertvolle Maschinen, und die in abgelegenen Kabinen eingeschlossenen Bewohner erstickten entweder an den giftigen Dämpfen oder wurden bei der Massenpanik totgetrampelt. Trotz der Verluste war der Plan aber ein Erfolg und die Schattenkreaturen wurden nie wieder gesehen.

languages.text: Güverte yakma işlemi düzgün başladı ancak bölmenin tamamen tahliye edilmediği anlaşılınca hızla kontrolden çıktı. Alevler, birçok paha biçilemez makineyi yok etti. Uzak kabinlerde kilitli kalan insanlar, zehirli duman veya izdiham yüzünden can verdi. Kayıplara rağmen plan başarılı oldu ve gölgelerde saklanan yaratıklar bir daha hiç görülmedi.
languages.original_text: The scorching of decks started properly but quickly went out of control when it became clear the chamber had not been fully evacuated. The roaring flame destroyed many priceless machines and the people locked in distant cabins either suffocated from the toxic smoke or perished in the stampede. Despite the losses, the plan was a success and the shadow-skulkers were never seen again.
